comment: Baba ki takhath ghati ni, kyun ki baba abhi kumwara hai
amr:
# ::snt Baba ki takhath ghati ni, kyun ki baba abhi kumwara hai
(a / and
      :op1 (b / baba
            :mode expressive)
      :op2 (b2 / bahath
            :mode expressive)
      :op3 (b3 / bahath
            :mode expressive)
      :op4 (k / kyun
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1-of (m / mean-01
                  :ARG2 (b4 / bahath
                        :mode expressive)))
      :op5 (b5 / baba
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1-of m
            :ARG2 (k2 / kumwara
                  :mode expressive))
      :op6 (h / hai
            :mode expressive))

comment: Aur uske sath me patanjali ka Covid vaccine bhi
amr:
# ::snt Aur uske sath me patanjali ka Covid vaccine bhi
(b / bhi
      :mode expressive
      :mod (v / vaccine
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Covid"))
      :ARG1-of (m / mean-01
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Aur"
                        :op2 "Uske"
                        :op3 "Sath")
                  :ARG0-of (s / say-01
                        :ARG1 v))))
